Straight Shot nods.

" That's right, that was in the report.   If I can get=
 a fix on who has it I could steal it back for us."

Perpetually on the mov=
e and constantly busy. 

On Sep 12, 2011, at 12:57 AM, Super Cyclonus <supe=
rcyclonus@...> wrote:

> As TALON and STRAIGHT SHOT talked, seeming t=
o argue over who had the
> greatest blame and who should go into the jaws o=
f certain death, LEO
> PRIME stood behind LEGACY as he worked on the scans =
that the Ark had
> so recently taken.
> 
> Finally LEGACY looked up. "I can=
not trace the destination of the
> bridge because it is not a space bridge =
in the typical sense. It does
> transfer from one mechanical apature to ano=
ther, but rather it creates
> a temporary energized one and transfers from =
one in a manner I am not
> accustomed to."
> 
> LEGACY tilted his head as h=
e continued his scan, "The distances this
> bridge could reached would not =
be great, perhaps planet wide only but
> it would cost signifigantly less i=
n energy to use."
> 
> LEO turned to look at STRAIGHT SHOT, "In the last re=
port you guys sent
> back didn't the Predacons recover a device that DARK R=
ODIMUS used
> during his transport?"
> 
> LEGACY nodded, "I have read the r=
eport. If that is a controller of
> some type for this bridge network and w=
e had access to this a device I
> might be able to use it to scan for its h=
ome source."
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
> 
> > Talon:
> >
> > "Same with you"s=
aid Talon
>

      <p>As TALON and STRAIGHT SHOT talked, seeming to ar=
gue over who had the<br>
greatest blame and who should go into the jaws of =
certain death, LEO<br>
PRIME stood behind LEGACY as he worked on the scans =
that the Ark had<br>
so recently taken.<br>
<br>
Finally LEGACY looked up. =
"I cannot trace the destination of the<br>
bridge because it is not a space=
 bridge in the typical sense. It does<br>
transfer from one mechanical apat=
ure to another, but rather it creates<br>
a temporary energized one and tra=
nsfers from one in a manner I am not<br>
accustomed to."<br>
<br>
LEGACY ti=
lted his head as he continued his scan, "The distances this<br>
bridge coul=
d reached would not be great, perhaps planet wide only but<br>
it would cos=
t signifigantly less in energy to use."<br>
<br>
LEO turned to look at STRA=
IGHT SHOT, "In the last report you guys sent<br>
back didn't the Predacons =
recover a device that DARK RODIMUS used<br>
during his transport?"<br>
<br>=

LEGACY nodded, "I have read the report. If that is a controller of<br>
som=
e type for this bridge network and we had access to this a device I<br>
mig=
ht be able to use it to scan for its home source."<br>
<br>
(TAG)<br>
<br>
=
Preston<br>

> Talon:<br>
><br>
> "Same with you"said Talon<br=
